name: PixelOS
changelog:
• fixed remount (don't ask how because i don't know)
  • switch to jemalloc (thanks to @PowerX_NOT)
  • added MIUI Camera (night mode, portrait mode and maybe other things won't work)
notes:
• Non RDP
  • With Gapps
  • KSU-Next + SUSfs -> installing magisk will cause bootloop
  • Screen off FOD
  • Be aware: an user reported hardware damage after using clear speaker feature. as me and other tester were unable to reproduce such damage, feature is still present, but to prevent any potential harm, use it only if needed.
  • Installation instructions: telegra.ph
